articles.title: Paris prosecutor says arrested man is thought to be 4th member of Louvre heist gang
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — A man arrested by French police earlier this week is thought to be the fourth member of the team that stole France’s crown jewels from the Louvre Museum, the Paris prosecutor said Friday, meaning that the entire gang that carried out the brazen heist is now believed to have been caught.
